duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform duties related to customer service, stocking, and sanitation in assigned department(s).
Follow department procedures for preparing, storing, rotating, and stocking of product.
Prepare, package, weigh, and price products for sale.
Monitor product quality and freshness and ensure proper product rotation.
Ensure cases and shelves are clean and well-stocked.
Provide excellent customer service, address needs of customers in a timely and effective manner, and model suggestive selling techniques.
Maximize sales potential through effective and proper procedures for prepping, storing, rotating, stocking, and merchandising product.
Follow and comply, or ensure compliance, with established procedures, including Weights and Measures, health and sanitation, and safe work practices.
Maintain, or ensure maintenance of, a clean and sanitary working and shopping environment; maintain equipment in accordance with cleanliness and safety standards.
Ensure accuracy of signs and pricing.
Immediately report safety hazards and violations.
Perform other duties as assigned by store, regional, or national leadership.
